guide_disclaimer: * Please refer to the official Sapporo City guide for details.
note_burnable: Drain food waste. Soak up oil. Dirty paper/diapers are also burnable. Use designated bags.
note_spray: Use up completely. Do NOT puncture. Put in a separate transparent bag on Burnable days.
note_non_burnable: Glass, ceramics, small appliances. Wrap blades and label "Danger". Use designated bags.
note_lighter: Use up completely. Soak in water. Put in a separate transparent bag on Non-burnable days.
note_recyclable: Rinse inside. Remove caps/labels from PET bottles (put in Plastic). Use transparent bags.
note_battery: Alkaline/Manganese only. Put in a separate transparent bag on Recyclable days.
note_plastic: Items with Plastic mark. Rinse off dirt. Do not double bag.
note_paper: Paper boxes, envelopes, cores. Put in paper bags or tie with string.
note_green: Bundle branches (approx 50cm). Put grass/leaves in transparent bags. Do not mix with food waste.
important_notices: Please put out garbage by 8:30 AM on the collection day.
Garbage not in designated bags will not be collected.
Collection schedules change during the New Year holidays.
Collection may be canceled during severe weather (e.g., typhoons).
No garbage collection on Saturdays and Sundays.
